name: Deliverace
detailed_description:
Deliverace is the brand new multiplayer game developed by Skyjaz Games.
Pick a car, team up (join a crew) and enter the fray. Whoever delivers more cargo/supplies wins. But that’s not all!
Other multiplayer modes will be available as well, such as Free for All - where each racer is competing against every other player looking for supremacy;
Bomb Mode, in which a random vehicle is chosen to carry a timed bomb that should be transferred to other player before it goes off.
Different levels, shield power-ups and many other features will be available so that you can create your own and unique gameplay style.
There are many types of vehicles to choose from, each with its own set of characteristics, to make sure that the gameplay will be unique and adaptable to your playstyle. You will be rewarded with different paintings, decals, wheels, parts to improve your car, achievements and trophies for your efforts in Deliverace.

Game Modes:


  • Delivery Race
  • Battle Royale
  • Bomb Mode
  • Get the Package

Key Features:


Region servers (For Early Access, region server will be available gradually)
Rooms with 3x3 and 4x4
Partial controller support
Battle Royale x24 Players
Matchmaking
Car Visual Customization

Localization:

For us, localization is important to make your experience in game better.
We're translating the game as soon as possible and each language will be available in future updates.

short_description: Pick a car, team up and enter the fray. Whoever delivers more cargo/supplies wins.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 1.4 or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2000 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Deliverace is an Early Access game, and minimum specifications may change during development
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.8 or later
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Support DX9
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2000 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Deliverace is an Early Access game, and minimum specifications may change during development
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04+ equivalent or above
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2000 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Deliverace is an Early Access game, and minimum specifications may change during development
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
